entry.data:
CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 19
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE EVENING

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
